nsisAllowHeaderCompilation: By default, only `.nsi` files will be compiled. This setting enables compilation for `.nsh` files as well.
nsisAlwaysShowOutput: Output channel will only be shown on errors
nsisPreprocessMode: Linter runs in the much faster [pre-process mode](https://nsis.sourceforge.io/Docs/Chapter3.html#usagereference), but ignores warnings (unless in strict mode)
